author: vanto
msg: ODE-901: Improved handling of SMX4 BPEL bundles. Big thanks to Kurt Westerfeld.

author: stefan2
msg: Final touch on the xdelta code.
First, fix initial checksum calculation.  We need *pseudo*-Alder32
checksums here instead of "proper" Adler32 values.  Interrestingly,
this mismatch did not hurt compression rates much in most cases.
Also, we can manipulate pseudo-Alder32 checksums directly when rolling
them over the data buffer. This saves us a couple of cycles per
mismatching position, i.e. every single non-compressed byte.

author: rickmcguire
msg: update openejb server pom so release/versions plugins can update

author: vanto
msg: fixes a classloading issue with JMX on SMX 4 (Kudos to Kurt Westerfeld).
